params.name: API wallet name (empty string makes it main API wallet)

checkSufficientBalance(address,uint64,ui.details: Check if user has sufficient balance for an order

returns.hasBalance: True if user has sufficient balance

params.createNonce: Create nonce (used if variant is Create)

getMarketData(uint32).details: Get market data for an asset

marketBuy(uint32,uint64,uint64).details: Place a simple market buy order using IOC

marketSell(uint32,uint64,uint64).details: Place a simple market sell order using IOC

params.cloid: Client order ID (0 for no cloid)
params.isBuy: True for buy, false for sell

spotSend(address,uint64,uint64).details: Send spot tokens to another address

tokenDelegate(address,uint64,bool).details: Delegate or undelegate tokens to/from validator

params.isUndelegate: True to undelegate, false to delegate

params.toPerp: True to transfer to perp, false to transfer to spot

params.isDeposit: True for deposit, false for withdraw
